column1: keith wayne smith| keith wayne smith. born: march 26
column3: 2015 mr smith was a native of lawrence co
column5: a member of loretto church of christ. funeral service for mr smith will be sunday june 14
column6: 2015 at loretto memorial chapel at 2:00 pm
column7: with danny pettus officiating. with burial to follow in richardson chapel cemetery. visitation will be sunday june 14
column8: 2015 from 11:00 am to 2:00 pm at loretto memorial chapel. he is survived by his mother- bonnie nell hughes smith of loretto
